page.title: 08FARMING IN CLATFORD
page.content: The Goodworth Clatford/Wherwell region is predominantly a {FARMING}area.The landscape is covered by a patchwork of {ARABLE FIELDS}growing mostly wheat and barley.There are some fields kept for hay to feed sheep and cattle.The livestock is mostly kept on rough grassland near the two rivers the River Anton and the River Test. There are five {FARMS}in the district but two are run by one organisation. They keep a small pedigree Guersey herd of 50 cows.Keepers Cottage has a pheasant farm to stock the area for the pheasant shooting season. The farms in our area are: Manor Farm,Norman Court Farm,Cowdown Farmhouse,Keepers Cottage,Park Farm and Dublin Farm.The last two are run by Wherwell Farms Ltd.
